xbrlcore.taxonomy
Class DTSFactory

java.lang.Object
  xbrlcore.taxonomy.DTSFactory

public class DTSFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class generates an xbrlcore.taxonomy.DiscoverableTaxonomySet object and all other necessary objects for the representation of a DTS according to a taxonomy file. It is modelled according to the Factory pattern.

Author:
Daniel Hamm

Method Detail

get

public static DTSFactory get()
Returns an object of the class DTSFactory. This is the only way to create such an object, the constructor cannot be invoked.

Returns:
An instance of this object.

createTaxonomy

public DiscoverableTaxonomySet createTaxonomy(java.io.File taxonomyFile)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                              TaxonomyCreationException,
                                              XBRLException
Creates and returns a discoverable taxonomy set (DTS), represented through a DiscoverableTaxonomySet object. The DTS is created based on the given file, which is expected to be an XBRL taxonomy. If this taxonomy imports other taxonomies, they are also created by this method and can be obtained afterwards via the according methods.

Parameters:
taxonomyFile - File containing the XBRL taxonomy.
Returns:
Discoverable taxonomy set, based on the given file, including all imported taxonomies.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException
TaxonomyCreationException
XBRLException
